name: Reaction Frequency
description:
Reaction Frequency is a small puzzle game I made for the 1-Bit weekend game jam.

It's my first ever game jam entry and my first ever uploaded game. I will be pushing a fixed version after the game jam ends, it will have more and harder puzzles, better physics, sounds (wow) and an overall quality improvement.

In this game you go around a nuclear power plant and tune nuclear reactors.

Controls are: 

AD: Move left/right

Spacebar: Jump

WS: Tune reactors

(In the last level you need to enter a binary number, that number is the amount of levels there are in the game, and in level 5 you need to tune the last reactor all the way to 0, all because I made a mistake during the last 15 minutes of development. Sorry)
